description: This file defines the ToDoItemControlRenderer class, a custom renderer for ToDoItemControl components in a TodoMVC application using Closure Library. It manages DOM structure, CSS classes, and ARIA states for the control.

classes.name: todomvc.view.ToDoItemControlRenderer
classes.description: A renderer class for ToDoItemControl that handles DOM structure, state updates, and accessibility features.

methods.name: createDom
methods.description: Creates the DOM element for the control, sanitizing HTML and setting ARIA states.

methods.name: setState
methods.description: Updates the control's appearance based on its state, such as checked or selected.

methods.name: getKeyEventTarget
methods.description: Returns the element that should receive keyboard focus, typically an input element.

methods.name: getDisplayElement
methods.description: Returns the main display element of the control.

methods.name: getContentElement
methods.description: Returns the element containing the control's content.

methods.name: getCheckboxElement
methods.description: Returns the checkbox element within the control.

methods.name: getInputElement
methods.description: Returns the input element within the control.
